summary: WHEN  THE VEHICLE MADE A  TURN STEERING WHEEL WOULD BECAME LOOSE, AND THE VEHICLE JERKED INTO THE NEXT LANE.  STEERING WHEEL  BECAME STIFF AFTER IT JERKED. THE PROBLEM ONLY HAPPENED WHEN A  LEFT OR RIGHT TURN WAS MADE. THE MECHANIC INDICATED THAT EVO SENSOR WAS GOING OUT AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *JB.....*AK
